title: Bug 19089 No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When using the Photon version of the software, there is no popup menu displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the java editor.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the java editor in the Photon version, a popup menu should appear. This menu should allow users to add breakpoints, marks, and other related options.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
